491680.name: Fantasy Grounds - Weird Wars Rome (Savage Worlds)
491680.description:
Stride forth with the legions of Rome to the distant corners of the worldthe Celtic wilds, the forests of Germania, the deserts of Aegyptusand into a history few will ever know. Witness a history of the dark things that rise as blood and war mingle with shadows and fear.

Fight the darkness in a war that spans centuries. Fight the darkness to your last breathand beyond! Fight the darkness for Rome!
Players in Weird Wars Rome are legionaries battling the enemies of Rome, as well as stranger things they encounter in their bloody travels across the Empire. The book features two Plot Point Campaigns, new rules for creating "Legacies" from era to era, equipment, strange creatures, enemies and allies, expanded rules for naval combat and sieges, the history of Weird Wars in the Roman period, a new Arcane Background, and an Adventure Generator for any war the legionaries of Rome find themselves fighting.
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the Savage Worlds ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Perry Chalmers
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds Adventure Edition ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
